DataElement.preferredName: Biospecimen Domain Specimen Submission CDISC Variable Terminology Date
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The date of biospecimen data collection.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A findings domain that documents biospecimen handling information._A part of a thing, or of several things, taken to demonstrate or to determine the character of the whole, e.g. a substance, or portion of material obtained for use in testing, examination, or study; particularly, a preparation of tissue or bodily fluid taken for examination or diagnosis._The act of referring for judgment or consideration by others; the act of handing over something.
